protein.general_function: Involved in G-protein coupled receptor activity
protein.specific_function: Isoform 1E function may be to regulate the availability of functional GABA-B-R1A/GABA-B-R2 heterodimers by competing for GABA-B-R2 dimerization. This could explain the observation that certain small molecule ligands exhibit differential affinity for central versus peripheral sites

go_class.description: cell surface receptor linked signaling pathway
g-protein coupled receptor protein signaling pathway
